# paymentDiscount

**Instance Property**

The details of the discount offer to apply to the payment.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying var paymentDiscount: SKPaymentDiscount? { get }
```

## Getting Discount Details

- **SKPaymentDiscount**: The signed discount to apply to a payment.
